name: Console Warpers
description:
A Platformer Game I made in 3 days for te MFGG Fangame Jam 5.

You enter different consoles with special levels that are based off of the console.

Im very excited to see the results. I couldnt finish everything that I wanted to add to the game but its okay.

If you enjoy the game then I would humbly request a follow from you. Or not, I dont mind either (But I prefer follows!)

BACKSTORY:

You start as a Nintendo DS and explore the First Level, A Beach full of zoomba's (not trying to get copyrighted xd).

Once you leave the beach you enter Mii City and Transform into a Nintendo Wii, and explore at night. Look out for Matt or else he will get you!

Then you unexpectedly end up in a Halo Battlefield after escaping Matt in Wii City. So now you are dealing with Master Cheif. You are also an Xbox 360.
